meanings.definition: A group of individuals within a species that interbreed and share a common gene pool.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, the gamodeme of squirrels stayed close together to protect their young.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how the gamodeme of birds in this area has evolved over time.

meanings.sent4: The gamodeme of flowers in the garden bloomed in a beautiful array of colors.
meanings.sent5: The gamodeme of wolves worked together to hunt for food in the winter.

meanings.definition: The smallest unit of a population that can evolve.
meanings.sent1: Each gamodeme of bacteria in the lab was carefully monitored for any genetic changes.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the gamodeme of fish in the lake adapted to the changing water temperature.
meanings.sent3: The gamodeme of ants held a tiny evolution conference to discuss their next steps.
